notes: [Fixed] Fixed issue where `startingHeaderLevel` was not reflected in settings
[Fixed] Fixed issue where `startingHeaderLevel` was not applied unless `addHeaderAnchors` was `true`
[Updated] Updated to the latest version of the external markdown parser
[Updated] Updated the codebase to be more in line with PSR-2 and new Craft coding style
[Updated] Updated several parts of the codebase to be compatible with Craft 2.5+ and PHP 7+.
[Added] Added the `updates` shortcode for elegant styling of update notes
[Added] Added responsive `image` and fluid video `vimeo|youtube` shortcodes
[Added] Added the ability to place the toolbar at the top, bottom or both #15
[Updated] Updated default shortcodes with the ability to provide custom templates
[Updated] Updated parsing by triggering events before each parsing routine
[Removed] Removed all traces of ace editor which proved inconsistent
